newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian police say hashish found in tea shipment.
newsitem.headline: Romanian police say hashish found in tea shipment.

text.p: Customs police in Romania's Black Sea port of Constanta said on Friday they had seized 1.3 tonnes of hashish found in a container carrying tea.
Constanta police spokesman Marian Saragea declined to name the ship or say where the container came from.
He said the drugs consignment was coming through Romania on the so-called "Balkan route" westwards.
